items.content_html: The Vanilla Calendar Pro is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker component with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript frameworks and libraries. It is designed to be lightweight, easy to use, and feature-rich, without relying on external dependencies.
items.title: uvarov-frontend/vanilla-calendar-pro: The Vanilla Calendar Pro is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker component with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript frameworks and libraries. It is designed to be lightweight, easy to use, and feature-rich, without relying on external dependencies.

items.content_html: TaskSync is a lightweight task management app designed for organizing tasks into collections, syncing them in real-time, and offering offline support.

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
items.title: n1ru4l/envelop: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.
items.title: testcontainers/testcontainers-node: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient WhatsApp bot designed to streamline interactions. Powered by the XSTRO API for core functionality, with Axios ensuring fast performance. Requires only a stable server internet connection.

items.content_html: A lightweight state machine implementation for Zustand state management. This library provides a simple yet powerful way to manage complex state transitions with features like guards, reducers, middleware, and hierarchical states.

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
